body_html:
I'll close this issue. Please comment to reope if there something that we can/should do to our configure script.

The --expunge is net beneficial in terms of issue load, I fear, so that'll stay for now.

body:
I'll close this issue. Please comment to reope if there something that we can/should do to our configure script. 

The `--expunge` is net beneficial in terms of issue load, I fear, so that'll stay for now.
